name: DIGITizE Pharmacogenomic Ordering Support IOM
description: Establishing Connectivity and Pharmacogenomic Clinical Decision Support Rules to Protect Patients Carrying HLA-B*57:01 and TPMT Variants

resource.name: Library - Abacavir Ordering
resource.description: Logic to determine the whether or not an order of Abacavir is appropriate for a patient and alert the user if it is not.

resource.name: Library - Azathioprine Ordering
resource.description: Logic to determine the whether or not the dosage of Azathioprine is appropriate for a patient and alert the user if it is not.

resource.name: Decision Support Rule - Abacavir Conflicting Statuses
resource.description: Decision support rule to detect and report conflicting Abacavir Sensitivity tests.

resource.name: Decision Support Rule - Abacavir Hypersensitivity
resource.description: Decision support rule to detect and report Abacavir Hypersensitivity.

resource.name: Decision Support Rule - Abacavir Test Required
resource.description: Decision support rule to detect and report the need for an Abacavir Sensitivity test.

resource.name: Decision Support Rule - Azathioprine Conflicting Statuses
resource.description: Decision support rule to detect and report conflicting Azathioprine Myelotoxicity tests.

resource.name: Decision Support Rule - Azathioprine Lower Dosage
resource.description: Decision support rule to detect and report Azathioprine dosage level guidance.

resource.name: Decision Support Rule - Azathioprine Test Required
resource.description: Decision support rule to detect and report the need for an Azathioprine Myelotoxicity test.

resource.name: Decision Support Rule - Azathioprine Poor Status
resource.description: Decision support rule to detect and report Azathioprine Myelotoxicity poor status guidance.
